longBusinessSummary: Ai Holdings Corporation provides security and peripheral computer equipment, measuring devices, and card and other office equipment. The company offers security equipment, including surveillance cameras and recorders for banks, governmental facilities, shopping districts, retail shops, condominiums, and other facilities; card issuing systems for medical institutions and general purposes, such as magnetic card readers, ID cards, and cards with embedded IC chips; CAD software for steel structures; cutting plotters and label processing systems; and measurement devices for clients that comprise automakers, electrical appliance manufacturers, and university research institutes. It also engages in the earthquake-resistance inspection and seismic design activities; IoT promotion business, such as high-speed communication, digital transformation, and AI-based automation; and buying and selling of new and used equipment for semiconductor manufacturing and inspection equipment, consumables sales, and start-ups. In addition, the company is involved in the development, manufacture, and sale of automatic wet hand towel dispensers and metal detectors; manufacture and sale of frozen food and confection products; structural engineering, consulting, and worker dispatch businesses; provision of maintenance services; and development and sale of software and networking products. Further, it sells security systems and mailing system equipment; leases and installs office equipment, OA equipment, etc.; manages golf course; develops IoT devices and gateways; manufactures precision parts comprising insert nuts, spacers, screws, connectors, etc.; and manufactures, leases, and sells electronical measuring devices, other system devices, and electronical parts. Ai Holdings Corporation was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
